Package com.peyrona.mingle.glue.codeditor.UneEditorTabContent

Class UneEditorPane

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JScrollPane
            • org.fife.ui.rtextarea.RTextScrollPane
              • com.peyrona.mingle.glue.codeditor.UneEditorTabContent.UneEditorPane
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.ScrollPaneConstants
    public final class UneEditorPane
extends org.fife.ui.rtextarea.RTextScrollPane
    This class is a special JScrollPane (RTextScrollPane) containing a RSyntaxTextArea and the methods to interact with the RSyntaxTextArea.

    RSyntaxTextArea:
    • Project home: https://github.com/bobbylight/RSyntaxTextArea
      • >
    • New language: https://github.com/bobbylight/rsyntaxtextarea/wiki
    Author:
    Francisco Jos√© Morero Peyrona Official web site at: https://github.com/peyrona/mingle
    See Also:
